name: 3d Maze 72
description:
Welcome to the newest and probably only 3d gTendo 72 game, 3d Maze 72!

This game is not to be taken seriously and is just a edited version of a Griffpatch project due to wanting to just get a singular game out. Play trollstory or something if this doesn't fit your fancy.

Avoid looking at the trolls, because they will drain your health.
